reuters.title: ICN <ICN> HAS FIVE PCT OF SYNCOR <SCOR.O>
reuters.body: ICN Pharmaceuticals Inc told the Securities and Exchange Commission it has acquired 556,500 shares of Syncor International Corp, or 5.0 pct of the total outstanding common stock. ICN said it bought the stake for 3.9 mln dlrs as an investment and has no plans to seek control of the company or to participate in the management of it. Reuter 
